name: The Moonwalk
description:
Note: For the game to work go to another tab, click on that tab and then get back in the game tab.

M O O N. I wanted a game where you could walk on the moon, there wasn't one, so I made this in one day on CopperCube. This is my first game, and since CopperCube is easy to use it wasn't hard at all, unfortunately I don't have the full version of the Software, if I had I would've added Vignette and Blur which are Pro features. 

(Not a real representation of what bein in the moon looks, sounds or feels like)
